item.title: How to Undo and Redo in the Microsoft Notepad App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Undo: With Menu With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Redo With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Follow along with a tutorial video: How to Undo With Menu Step 1: First edit a Notepad file. In the upper left click the “Edit” button. Step 2: In the menu that opens, click “Undo”. Notepad reverses the last action. How to Undo With Right Click Step 1: Edit a Notepad file.
